title: Diet
description: A strategy of regulating the intake of food to achieve or maintain a specific health-related goal.

physiologicalBenefits.description: Specific physiologic benefits associated to the plan.

risks.description: Specific physiologic risks associated to the diet plan.

endorsers.description: People or organizations that endorse the plan.

expertConsiderations.description: Medical expert advice related to the plan.

dietFeatures.description: Nutritional information specific to the dietary plan. May include dietary recommendations on what foods to avoid, what foods to consume, and specific alterations/deviations from the USDA or other regulatory body's approved dietary guidelines.
